UNTDID8179Type.title: Transport means description code
UNTDID8179Type.description:
Code specifying the means of transport.

Code list responsible agency:
UNECE

Code list responsible agency name:
United Nations Economic Commission for Europe

Code list responsible agency code:
6

Code list:
Rec 28

Code list name:
Codes for Types of Means of Transport

Code list version:
2014

Code list issue date:
CL 2018-07
